comments.body:
`aspectRatio` is a `string`? The [css spec](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/Media_Queries/Using_media_queries#aspect-ratio) says it consists of two numbers 

Update: found [here](https://github.com/contra/react-responsive/blob/c82c67172b9dbd17dcdc6dbd918cb1568423661c/src/mediaQuery.js) that it is actually a string.

The propTypes in original library defines it as string
https://github.com/contra/react-responsive/blob/master/src/mediaQuery.js#L21
